tags.name: Two Step Verification API
tags.description: API resources for the Two Step Verification service

post.description: creates a new verification and sends the message to the recipient

arguments.description: A list of arguments for the template message.For example, if the template message contains an @@name and a name:john is send as an argument the @@name will be replaced with john

recipient.description: The recipient to send the sms message to (must be a valid phone number)

template.description: The template to send to the user, if not provided the appropriate template from the settings will be send. The template must contain the @@pin that will be replaced by the generated code

templateCountry.description: The country that will be used to select the appropriate template (if a template wasn't specified in this request).If not provided the country will be exported from the recipient mobile number

VerificationDto.description: A verification request. When send it will initiate the two step verification process

status.description:
The status of the verification. 
Pending: When the verification is created and is waiting for a confirmation, 
Verified: A correct answer was provided, 
Cancelled: The verification was cancelled,
Expired: The verification is expired,
Failed: A wrong answer was provided

updatedAt.description: The date that this verification was update

VerificationStatusDto.description: Represents status information about a verification request

lifetimeInSeconds.description: Indicates the number of seconds that the verification will be valid, when that time passes the user will not be able to confirm the request

maxRetries.description: The number of times the user is allowed to enter a wrong answer before the verification becomes invalid
